column5: Bloom2 is very luxurious to touch; and amazing to walk and sit on. This is a very dense rug which comes in all the latest fashion colours and designs.
column7: Non-shedding; every rug is unique; very thick dense soft pile; vibrant colours; antistatic and easy to clean.
column13: Regular vacuuming required. Do not use power or rotary head vacuum cleaners. Do not pull at fibres. Professional cleaning recommended. Any spills should be blotted up immediately. Keep out of direct sunlight. Loose fibres maybe present.
